name: Estate of Jacob W. Seitzinger, Deceased. Appeal of Pennsylvania Trust Company, Trustee of Mary Agnes Boardman

judges: Before Williams, McCollum, Mitchell, Dean and Fell, JJ.
parties: Estate of Jacob W. Seitzinger, Deceased. Appeal of Pennsylvania Trust Company, Trustee of Mary Agnes Boardman.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Dean,
The appeals of Illig and Brother, and James K. Getz, trustee, and others, from the same decree in which opinions are herewith filed, rule this ease.
The decree is affirmed and appeal dismissed at costs of appel lant.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Dean,

attorneys: Philip 8. Zieber and Baer $ Snyder, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Estate of Jacob W. Seitzinger, Deceased. Appeal of Pennsylvania Trust Company, Trustee of Mary Agnes Boardman.
Will — Trust and trustees.
Argued March 5, 1895.
Appeal, No. 23, Jan. T., 1895, by Pennsylvania Trust Company, trustee, from decree of O. C. Berks Co., overruling exceptions to adjudication.
Before Williams, McCollum, Mitchell, Dean and Fell, JJ.
Affirmed.
Exceptions to adjudication.
The facts appear in Illig’s Appeal, supra.
Philip 8. Zieber and Baer $ Snyder, for appellant.
October 7, 1895:
